SEARCH
Module ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2
Package ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2.paint.commandMenuBar

Interface Command

All Known Implementing Classes:
CommandCopy, CommandCopyright, CommandCut, CommandDarkMode, CommandExit, CommandLightMode, CommandNew, CommandOpen, CommandPaste, CommandRedo, CommandSave, CommandUndo
public interface Command
The Command interface defines a contract for executable actions within the paint application. This interface follows the Command design pattern, allowing actions to be defined as separate command objects.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    execute(PaintModel model, javafx.scene.Scene scene, PaintController controller)
    Executes a command action.

  • Method Details

    • execute

      void execute(PaintModel model, javafx.scene.Scene scene, PaintController controller)
      Executes a command action.
      Parameters:
      model - The PaintModel, which manages the application's state.
      scene - The JavaFX Scene associated with the paint application, allowing commands to interact with the UI.
      controller - The PaintController, which provides access to control and manipulate the paint application with users' mouse events.
